text: According to washingtonpost.com, the 39-year-old doctor is "the Obama team's first choice '' to become America's most senior public health official. Although Gupta has not commented on the matter, the Post claims that he wants the job and is undergoing final vetting. CNN has confirmed Gupta has been approached by the president-elect's transition team.
title: Barack Obama has asked the CNN medical correspondent Dr Sanjay Gupta to join his fledgling administration as the US surgeon general, according to reports.
